attributes.action: Request money back for students of the collapsed IT Firm Advent Consulting Ltd
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As currently being publicised by the BBC.  Advent Computer Training in the midlands have gone bust causing around 6000 students to lose their training provider and still have debts of up to £6000 to pay.  Barclays say they are currently looking into new training providers as they are as liable as Advent due to the "Link loan" they were offering students.  The students want their money back!

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to request money back for students of the collapsed IT Firm Advent Consulting Ltd.

Her Majesty's Government has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.hmg.gov.uk/epetition-responses/petition-view.aspx?epref=adventcomputer
